EmailTemplate.name: Global_Email_Welcome Nurture_Q119.2 - Build relevant and resilient software that
EmailTemplate.subject: Build relevant and resilient software that can run anywhere
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Greetings from Pivotal!
.NET developers are constantly asked to build relevant and resilient software that can run anywhere. That alone is a tall order. But also being asked to upgrade existing .NET software to unlock new value - gets to be a little overwhelming.
Check out the link below and see how .NET developers and architects are improving the most impactful parts of their existing codebase to build a sustainable process for refining their .NET app portfolios.
Cloud-Native .NET The Right Way <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/pivotal-cloud-native-dotnet-the-right-way]]>
If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]> or visit our Application Modernization resource center <[[https://content.pivotal.io/application-modernization]]>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
